name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 21 – The “Christmas” 2019 Special

content.html:
Dear Internet, We have a very special “Christmas” themed episode for you. We talk about all the holiday stories. We talk about hot dogs, secret santa, and dancing with your co workers. You know, standard Christmas things. This one’s wild folks, happy holidays! We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
content.value:
